channel.title: [Class suggestion] The Mortician
channel.description:
>**The Mortician** Neutral killing **Passive: Corpse's vigor** Immune to death at night **Passive: Cadaver's suspicion** When ever you or a player you have stuffed a corpse into the room of is investigated, all the investigator sees is _"You were too distracted by the dead bodies in your targets room to snoop around"_ **Night ability: Abduct** Kill your target. You can choose to either stuff the corpse in someone else's room of your choosing, or dissect them and gain a use of *transplant*. -infinite uses **Day ability: Transplant** Your target will lose immunity to death, if they have it, until they are healed by a physician or an alchemist, thanks to an infection you left in them. -0 uses
Notes: -Corpse's vigor makes attacks occupy you instead because you heal yourself instead of attacking. -with abduct, you target the player you want to attack and then target a second player. If you target yourself, you gain a use of transplant. If you target someone else, you stuff the body in their room. -Players you kill will be shown as "missing" rather than dead. Their class and journal is still shown, however.
